feed.title: Personal musings of Gagan Maheshwari - a technophile, a polyglot, a seasoned technology leader, a change agent and an entrepreneur.

entry.title: My Opinion on Patents
entry.content:
Patents are innovation blockers

Patents discourage innovation. Patents also hinder the growth of free and open source software and technology.

Some day, I’d love to extend and update this post with more details on why I feel what I said above.

Until later!

My Opinion on Patents was originally published by Gagan Maheshwari at Personal musings of Gagan Maheshwari - a technophile, a polyglot, a seasoned technology leader, a change agent and an entrepreneur. on June 29, 2016.
